h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)
content: With little warning, he'll transform you into a bat, and have you follow him across the mountain pass to take in the sights (unlike your brief transformation into a cicada, you can't control this part).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Frost-Clad Path' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Fight - Macaque Chief (First Encounter)'.
The content is as follows:
With little warning, he'll transform you into a bat, and have you follow him across the mountain pass to take in the sights (unlike your brief transformation into a cicada, you can't control this part).
